summary: The first benefit rock concert when major musicians performed to raise humanitarian relief funds for the refugees of Bangladesh of 1971 war.
cast: George Harrison|Bob Dylan|Ravi Shankar|Ringo Starr|Eric Clapton|Leon Russell|Billy Preston|Klaus Voormann|Jim Keltner|Pete Ham|Tom Evans|Mike Gibbins|Joey Molland|Jesse Ed Davis|Jim Horn|Allan Beutler|Kamala Chakravarty|Chuck Finley|Jeany Greene|Marlin Greene|Dolores Hall|Jacky Kelso|Ustad Aliakbar Khan|Claudia Lennear|Lew McCreary|Ollie Mitchell|Don Nix|Don Preston|Carl Radle|Alla Rakha|Mal Evans|Allen Klein|Phil Spector
title: The Concert for Bangladesh
